levels.description: Stops attacking and targets the ally with the highest HP within range, enveloping them and herself within a ring of fire. Each ring of fire deals <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Arts damage every second to all enemies in the surrounding 8 tiles
